segments.text: Johnny , are you just sitting around again ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm just taking a break between washing the windows and cleaning the toilet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd say all you've done is moved the dirt from the windows on to your face and hands . Disgraceful !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your best isn't good enough . Back in my day , I'd clean a whole hospital with a toothbrush and spit , and it'd be twice as clean as this sty !
segments.speaker: S1
